thread.title: Caroline
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by Caroline

author: Caroline
title: Caroline
text: Professional, friendly and efficient. The counselor was extremely informative and took the stress out what can be an overwhelming process if done without the assistance.
